question:
The Central Adoption Resource Authority recently organised a National Consultation on Adoption. In context of this, consider the following statements about CARA:
  1. It is a statutory body.
  2. It functions under the human resource development ministry.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The Central Adoption Resource Authority is a statutory and autonomous body of the Indian government. It was set up in 1990 and functions as the nodal body for adoption of children in India. It monitors and regulates in-country and inter-country adoptions. Statement 2 is incorrect: The Central Adoption Resource Authority is an autonomous body under the ministry of women and child development. It deals with the inter- country adoption in accordance with the Hague Convention on Inter- country Adoptions- which was ratified by the Indian government in 2003.
